bug.question: I have six legs and can fly. I like to buzz around flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 🐝 I make honey.
🌼 I help flowers grow.
🚖 I am yellow and black.

bug.question: I hop and jump and like to eat plants in your garden. I am usually green. What am I?

hints.text: 🦵 I have strong back legs.
🌿 I can be a pest in the garden.
🎶 I am known to sing during the summer.

bug.question: I march in lines and work together to carry crumbs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I live in a colony.
💪 I am very strong for my size.
🧺 I carry food back to my home.

bug.question: I start as a caterpillar, then spin a cocoon, and finally emerge with beautiful wings. What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 I go through metamorphosis.
🌈 I have colourful wings.
🌸 I love flowers.

bug.question: I light up the night with my glowing bottom. What am I?

hints.text: 💡 I am a beetle.
✨ I glow in the dark.
🌃 You can find me on warm nights.

bug.question: I have a hard shell and crawl on the ground. Some people think I'm lucky. What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 I am small and round.
⚫ I have black spots.
🐞 Farmers like me because I eat aphids.

bug.question: I make a sticky web to catch my dinner. Who am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I have eight legs, not six.
🕷️ Some people are scared of me.
🪰 I trap flies in my web.

bug.question: I drink blood and can be annoying. Some say I 'mosquito' you to dance. What am I?

hints.text: 🦟 I have a long, pointy mouth.
🎵 My buzz can be irritating.
💉 I bite and leave itchy bumps.

bug.question: I look like a stick and blend in with trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I eat leaves.
🌳 I am a master of disguise.
🍃 I can be hard to spot.

bug.question: I am a predator that blends in with leaves and sometimes looks like I am praying. What am I?

hints.text: 🙏 I catch other insects.
🦗 I have long, green legs.
🍃 My front legs are held in front of me in a 'prayer-like' position.

food.question: I am yellow and curved. Monkeys love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍌 I grow in bunches.
💛 You peel me before you eat me.
☀️ I'm a good source of potassium.

food.question: I am white and come from a cow. You can drink me or put me on your cereal. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I make your bones strong.
🐮 I am made by an animal.
🥣 I am often served cold.

food.question: I am red and juicy, and grow on trees. An apple a day keeps the doctor away! What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 I can be used to make juice.
🥧 I am often used in pies.
🌳 I have a core with seeds inside.

food.question: I am long and orange, and rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am a root vegetable.
🌱 I grow underground.
👀 I can improve your eyesight.

food.question: I am made of dough and often have cheese and tomato sauce on top. What am I?

hints.text: 🍕 I am usually cut into slices.
🇮🇹 I originated in Italy.
🔥 I am baked in an oven.

food.question: I am a small, round, green vegetable. I am often served with dinner. What am I?

hints.text: 🟢 I grow in pods.
🌱 I am a legume.
🍲 I can be cooked or eaten raw.

food.question: I am a fruit with a fuzzy skin and sweet green flesh inside. What am I?

hints.text: 🥝 I have small, black seeds.
🇳🇿 I am grown in New Zealand.
🥄 You can scoop out the inside.

food.question: I am a grain that is often eaten in Asian countries. I can be white or brown. What am I?

hints.text: 🍚 I am often served with soy sauce.
🌾 I grow in paddies.
🍣 I am a key ingredient in sushi.

food.question: I am a type of bread with a hole in the middle. I'm often boiled before I'm baked. What am I?

hints.text: 🥨 I can be sweet or savory.
🥯 I'm often eaten for breakfast.
🗽 I am popular in New York City.

food.question: I am a creamy frozen dessert that comes in many flavors. What am I?

hints.text: 🍦 I am often eaten in a cone.
🍨 I am made from milk or cream.
🍫 I'm a popular treat on a hot day.
